title: Noam Chomsky: Manufacturing Consent and Resisting Propaganda and Manipulation
description:
Join us as we delve into the groundbreaking work of Noam Chomsky and explore his theory of 'Manufacturing Consent,' exposing the hidden forces that control our thoughts and shape our world. We'll analyze the media's role in propaganda, the illusion of choice in democracy, and the importance of critical thinking and dissent in the fight for a more just and equitable society.
